intro.content:
In the last couple of days I have been playing a lot with Instagram and Buffer (to see how to automate future posts across different social media channels in case you wonder).
So, my apologies if you have seen pictures of Lilo our little Coton de Tulear appearing in your timeline, it was solely a test (and I promise itâ€™s almost over ðŸ™ƒ).

Otherwise, this week we applauded:
  • The successful rover landing on Mars
  • The power of the hug
  • A super cool DJ dog

hero.title: "Touchdown confirmed."
hero.description: Some positive news from the Perseverance Mars Rover
hero.why: There are very few things that make me as happy as a successful space mission. This landing on a remote planet is the result of years of collaboration, hard work, and patience. So, letâ€™s celebrate!
